text: Ruka may refer to: * Ruka (Okage), a fictional character * Rukatunturi (Finnish: Ruka), a ski resort in Finland * Ruka Souen, a character from the Vampire Knight manga series and its anime *Ruka (Mapuche), an indigenous housing form * Ruka, a character from the anime and manga series YuYu Hakusho * Ruka, a playable character from Fire Emblem Gaiden * Ruka, a playable character from Tear Ring Saga * The Hand, Czech animated short film, ()
title: Ruka
